channel.title: [718/742] Ultimatum [BETA]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ff7Droz.png[/img]
Hello guys, I am opening my project to the public so I can filter through the bugs a lot more. The XP rate is X20 of Runescape's XP rates, so no 99's within minutes here! We believe working hard to gain your levels and items is what makes it fun! Some of you may not agree with this, but that is your choice and your loss. The service we provide is beyond excellence and we strive to keep our players happy but also stick by what we believe is good for the server.
Features: -Slayer Points + Rewards (Slayer Helm, slayer ring (which gives x2 slayer points if worn), Slayer Gem. More to be added) - Custom Dungeoneering (Player enters an Instanced Dungeon where they have to kill 10 NPC's before they can enter the Boss Room, soon as they kill the boss they get their XP (Which is scaled depending on your Dungeoneering level) and they're teleported back outside) - All 24 Skills working (to some extent) - Custom Warrior's Guild and Rewards (Player uses any armour, Bronze to Rune but not including the shield on the Animator which spawns an animated warrior, they kill the NPC and gain points which can be used to buy defenders, RFD gloves and Fighter Torso, going to make it more complex soon) - 100% Effigies - 90% Easy cluescrolls - VPS (24/7 hosting) - All GWD Bosses (including nex with correct GFX/anims) - KQ (Drops drygores) - KBD - QBD - Ice demons (Unique mini boss that drops herb supplies and a very rare uncut onyx) - Glacors (with real RS drops) - Drygores with correct bonuses and attack styles - Custom Pest Control - Double XP weekends - Almost All Dungeons working (Including Polypore) - Amazing PvP Combat system with KDR and points for rewards - Around 90% of the NPC's have correct combat animations
[COLOR=red]--- RULES --- - No flaming/spamming staff - No asking for staff positions (Any asking of this will result in a mute and no chance of becoming staff) - Any bugs/glitches you find you must report on the official forums - No scamming - No gambling (any form of gambling is strictly shamed upon)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]--- MEDIA ---[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue] Custom Dungeoneering and Money Pouch Fixed (Thanks to _Andy)[/COLOR] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B5h1vQj7380[/youtube]
[COLOR=blue]Custom Trimmed Completionist Cape Requirements[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sUGp.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Boss Teleports[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sUKj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sUM0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sUNr.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Slayer Teleports[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sUTq.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Minigame Teleports[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sUP9.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Custom Shops[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sUWT.jpg[/img] [COLOR=blue]Armour, Herblore, Weapons, Magic, Slayer, Skilling[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Custom Warrior's Guild[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sVdE.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Kill The NPC[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sVgB.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Armour Returns To Players Inventory[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sVk6.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Points Are Gained And Shown By Shanomi[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7sVnu.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Store With Warrior Guild Items, RFD Gloves & Fighter Torso[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Working Ancient Effigies & Dragonkin Lamp (Thanks to Dan_)[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7vCRY.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Custom Dialogue Interface for Dragonkin Lamp (Will upgrade to an interface later)[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7vGCN.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7vGNj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7vGOi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7vGQV.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7vGRT.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7vGSS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7vGTF.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Correct Ganodermic Creating Using The Right Amount Of Flakes[/COLOR] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7D2qV.jpg[/img]
Correct Up To Date Level Up Interfaces [IMG]http://puu.sh/7N9wp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7N9wB.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=blue]Please sign up on here to report any issues/suggestions.[/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://ultimatum742.forumotion.co.uk/"]Official Forums[/URL]
[COLOR=blue]This is my project thread, currently has up to date media and updates.[/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/projects/540168-project-ultimatum-718-742-a.html"]Official Project Thread[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/3nhaqvhmm5h8v46/Ultimatum_742.jar"]Download The Client Here[/URL]
[COLOR=blue]Hope I see you soon :D[/COLOR][/center]

item.title: [718/742] Ultimatum [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @projectfusion projectfusion
item.description:
@projectfusion wrote:

[center]

Hello guys, I am opening my project to the public so I can filter through the bugs a lot more.
The XP rate is X20 of Runescape’s XP rates, so no 99’s within minutes here! We believe working hard to gain your levels and items is what makes it fun!
Some of you may not agree with this, but that is your choice and your loss. The service we provide is beyond excellence and we strive to keep our players happy but also stick by what we believe is good for the server.

Features:
-Slayer Points + Rewards (Slayer Helm, slayer ring (which gives x2 slayer points if worn), Slayer Gem. More to be added)

  • Custom Dungeoneering (Player enters an Instanced Dungeon where they have to kill 10 NPC’s before they can enter the Boss Room, soon as they kill the boss they get their XP (Which is scaled depending on your Dungeoneering level) and they’re teleported back outside)
  • All 24 Skills working (to some extent)
  • Custom Warrior’s Guild and Rewards (Player uses any armour, Bronze to Rune but not including the shield on the Animator which spawns an animated warrior, they kill the NPC and gain points which can be used to buy defenders, RFD gloves and Fighter Torso, going to make it more complex soon)
  • 100% Effigies
  • 90% Easy cluescrolls
  • VPS (24/7 hosting)
  • All GWD Bosses (including nex with correct GFX/anims)
  • KQ (Drops drygores)
  • KBD
  • QBD
  • Ice demons (Unique mini boss that drops herb supplies and a very rare uncut onyx)
  • Glacors (with real RS drops)
  • Drygores with correct bonuses and attack styles
  • Custom Pest Control
  • Double XP weekends
  • Almost All Dungeons working (Including Polypore)
  • Amazing PvP Combat system with KDR and points for rewards
  • Around 90% of the NPC’s have correct combat animations

[COLOR=red]— RULES —

  • No flaming/spamming staff
  • No asking for staff positions (Any asking of this will result in a mute and no chance of becoming staff)
  • Any bugs/glitches you find you must report on the official forums
  • No scamming
  • No gambling (any form of gambling is strictly shamed upon)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]— MEDIA —[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]
Custom Dungeoneering and Money Pouch Fixed (Thanks to _Andy)[/COLOR]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B5h1vQj7380[/youtube]

[COLOR=blue]Custom Shops[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Armour, Herblore, Weapons, Magic, Slayer, Skilling[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Custom Warrior’s Guild[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Kill The NPC[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Armour Returns To Players Inventory[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Points Are Gained And Shown By Shanomi[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Store With Warrior Guild Items, RFD Gloves & Fighter Torso[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Working Ancient Effigies & Dragonkin Lamp (Thanks to Dan_)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Custom Dialogue Interface for Dragonkin Lamp (Will upgrade to an interface later)[/COLOR]






[COLOR=blue]Correct Ganodermic Creating Using The Right Amount Of Flakes[/COLOR]

Correct Up To Date Level Up Interfaces

[COLOR=blue]Please sign up on here to report any issues/suggestions.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]This is my project thread, currently has up to date media and updates.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Hope I see you soon :D[/COLOR][/center]
